name: Blow Me!
description:
Memories of grumpy cartridges that only worked whenever it seemed to please them are inevitably linked to the childhood of those born in the 70s and 80s. Desperate, we tried so much to make our games work and sometimes our efforts were sucessful. Oftentimes, however, they were not.

Concept, graphics, programming: Nina Kiel

Fonts ("Good Times", "Ethnocentric"): Ray Larabie
TV static sound: Mike Koenig

Based on Pippin Barr's game idea tweet "You're a game, but you're no fun".
